DB_ERROR_FETCHING_ACCOUNT.title: Activation failed
DB_ERROR_FETCHING_ACCOUNT.detail: The account activation request did not complete due to an error looking up the account.

MISMATCHED_TOKENS.title: Activation failed
MISMATCHED_TOKENS.detail: The account activation request failed because the provided token does not match the expected activation token.

DB_ERROR_ACTIVATING_ACCOUNT.title: Activation failed
DB_ERROR_ACTIVATING_ACCOUNT.detail: The account activation failed due because the account update operation failed.

ACCOUNT_NOT_ACTIVATED.title: Reset request denied
ACCOUNT_NOT_ACTIVATED.detail: This accounts password cannot be reset because it is not currently activated

INVALID_EMAIL_FORMAT.title: Reset request denied
INVALID_EMAIL_FORMAT.detail: The provided email is not a valid email address.

UNKNOWN_EMAIL_ADDRESS.title: Reset request denied
UNKNOWN_EMAIL_ADDRESS.detail: The provided email does not match the email for this account.

DB_ERROR_FETCHING_ACCOUNT.title: Reset request denied
DB_ERROR_FETCHING_ACCOUNT.detail: The password reset request did not complete due to an error looking up the account.

DB_ERROR_SAVING_RESET_TOKEN.title: Reset request denied
DB_ERROR_SAVING_RESET_TOKEN.detail: The password reset request did not commplete due to an while preparing the reset token.

MISMATCHED_TOKENS.title: Reset request denied
MISMATCHED_TOKENS.detail: The password reset failed because the provided token does not match the expected reset token.

DB_ERROR_UPDATING_PASSWORD.title: Password Update Failed
DB_ERROR_UPDATING_PASSWORD.detail: The password was not updated because the save operation failed.
